title: AI analysis of chest X-rays may reveal early signs of aging
description: Artificial intelligence may be able to reveal how fast your body is aging by analyzing a chest X-ray, according to a new study published in The Journals of Gerontology. Researchers found that a deep learning model was able to detect subtle, age-related changes in the heart, lungs, and overall health more effectively than leading DNA-based "epigenetic clocks."
content: Artificial intelligence may be able to reveal how fast your body is aging by analyzing a chest X-ray, according to a new study published in The Journals of Gerontology. Researchers found that a deep learning model was able to detect subtle, age-relat... [1696 chars]

title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US, Asian markets fall
description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's main indexes closed lower on Wednesday, with the S&P 500 and the tech-heavy Nasdaq sinking to three-week lows as nagging worries about the artificial intelligence trade weighed on technology stocks. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 228.29 points, or 0.47%, to 47,885.97. The S&P 500 lost 78.83 points, or 1.16%, to 6,721.43. The Nasdaq Composite lost 418.14 points, or 1.81%, to 22,693.32.
content:

title: Technology exec says AI fuels blue-collar productivity boom, not job losses
description: Palantir chief technology officer Shyam Sankar says artificial intelligence technology is creating a blue-collar productivity boom, helping ICU nurses and factory workers.
content: Palantir chief technology officer Shyam Sankar told FOX Business that artificial intelligence (AI) is fueling a blue-collar productivity boom – not mass unemployment as forecast by Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt. – and said AI is accelerating hiring, trai... [4465 chars]

content:
